title: Foodshare meal to combat social isolation – and save food from landfill (University of Northampton) ...
text: ( Source : University of Northampton ) Tuesday 20th October 2015 ​​An academic from the University of Northampton is organising an event which is aimed at combating social isolation - and stopping food going to landfill. Nick Cartwright, a
